The time stamp on the surveillance video: not in 2016 as claimed in the article.
The article falsely connects the attack: Trump protests following the 2016 presidential election, when in reality, the attack had no relation to these protests.
The article: s claim that the attack occurred during a protest march in Philadelphia is contradicted by the fact that it took place at a service station, where the victim and the attackers were offering to pump gas for spare change.
